document_data.name: Dundar's Fine Swords
document_data.mainbody: '''Dundar's Fine Swords''' was a weapon shop that specialized in [[sword]]s located in [[Tilverton]] in the {{YearlinkName|1358}}.
document_data.Location: The shop sat in the south-eastern part of Tilverton on a side street off the [[Street of the Sorceress]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The shop was owned by a retired [[fighter]] named [[Dundar]]. His sister [[Andalara]] helped finish the blades and make scabbards when she was not out hunting.
document_data.Services: Around [[1366 DR]] Dundar had expanded his craft and started selling [[axe]]s, [[scythe]]s, [[saw]]s, and other bladed implements, eventually changing the shops name to '''Dundar's Fine Blades'''. He was sometimes assisted by his sibling Andalara, who finished weapons and made scabbards. Dundar also provided weapons training for aspiring warriors, drawing on his own significant skill and experience.
